mods.note: This postcard shows the Red River Furnace in Clarksville, Tennessee. It was mailed to Mrs. M. L. Moodie in Pembroke, Kentucky by her daughter with the initials M.M.B.. The back of the postcard has the notation: "Souvenir Post Card Co., New York, Printed in Germany." The note read: "A man can go out one day next week Monday or Tues. to do your work and will charge about $10. Hope you and Maude can come to see me. We are well, but they are sick at Mr. Boone's. Lovingly, M.M.B."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
